sentences.en: As you are aware, a fee will be charged annually.
sentences.cn: 正如你所知道的那样，每年都要收取一笔费用。

sentences.en: Eisenhower was intensely aware of the need for long-range planning.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔深谙长远规划的必要性。

sentences.en: He became aware of the soft, faint sounds of water dripping.
sentences.cn: 他开始注意到轻微的水滴声。

sentences.en: He became more aware of the things that started that tension off.
sentences.cn: 他越来越清楚地认识到引起紧张局势的原因。

sentences.en: He must have been aware that my parents' marriage was breaking up.
sentences.cn: 他一定已经知道我父母的婚姻即将破裂。

sentences.en: He was acutely aware of the odour of cooking oil.
sentences.cn: 他闻到一股浓浓的油烟味。

sentences.en: He was aware of the stink of stale beer on his breath.
sentences.cn: 他知道自己嘴里有股变味啤酒的馊味。

sentences.en: I am painfully aware that staff have a heavy work schedule.
sentences.cn: 我非常清楚员工们工作繁重。

sentences.en: I became more aware of the symbols and their meanings.
sentences.cn: 我进一步理解了这些符号及其意义。

sentences.en: I don't think people are really aware of just how much it costs.
sentences.cn: 我认为人们并不真正明白这要花多少钱。

sentences.en: I was well aware of what my interrogators wanted to hear.
sentences.cn: 我很清楚审问我的人想听到些什么。

sentences.en: Mr Braley has been made aware of the need for absolute secrecy.
sentences.cn: 布雷利先生被告知需要绝对保密。

sentences.en: She became distantly aware that the light had grown brighter.
sentences.cn: 她隐约感觉到灯变得更亮了。

sentences.en: She was acutely aware of the noise of the city.
She was aware that he was watching her fixedly.
sentences.cn: 她知道他正在盯着她看。

sentences.en: They're keenly aware that whatever they decide will set a precedent.
sentences.cn: 他们深知无论他们的决定是什么，都将开创先例。

sentences.en: We are aware of the potential problems and have taken every precaution.
sentences.cn: 我们已意识到潜在的问题，并采取了全面的预防措施。

sentences.en: Wells was well aware of the precariousness of human life.
sentences.cn: 韦尔斯深知人类生活的不稳定性。

sentences.en: Were you aware that something was wrong?
sentences.cn: 你有没有意识到已经出了问题？

trans.tran_cn: 知道的，意识到的，警觉的，有…意识的
trans.tran_en: if you are aware that a situation exists, you realize or know that it exists
